column4: hi... what will happen if i remove all the linux-images from synaptic? i have been dying to know this since the question came to my mind
Chroot in and re-install the kernels.
It also helps to use a client like irssi, it's a pain to learn but worth it just for "/lastlog".
thanks, i used irssi for a while - then i got out of touch. i will have to try it again.
